isp_info.isp_name: < Izina rya ISP > - umuhezangurisha w'ubushobozi bw'Internet
isp_info.isp_address: Inzira 10, umujyi hamwe na code y'iposita n'ibindi.

pagetitle: Sisitemu yo kwinjira ku mukozi | < Izina rya ISP >
inputUsername_placeholder: -- mwanditse Login mwibuke inyuguti nini n'utoya --
inputPassword_placeholder: -- mwanditse Ijambo ry'ibanga mwibuke inyuguti nini n'utoya --
anon_pretext1: Uko igikoresho cawe kizoba kiregererwa no kubona Internet, kanda kuri Injira. Uko guhuza kuzogumaho amasaha 12 yo kudakora ku gikoresho cawe.
status_pretext1: Igikoresho cawe carinjiwe kandi cabonye Internet. Uko guhuza kuzogumaho igihe cyagenwe n'abashinzwe urusobe hakurikijwe ibikorwa by'igikoresho cawe.
status_pretext2: Nimba ushaka guhagarika ubu guhuza, kanda KUVANAHO MURI SISITEMU.
noscript: Ibitangaza: Kugira ngo winjire neza muri sisitemu, JavaScript muri porogaramu yawe igomba kuba yatsa.
cp_portal_info: Gukoresha Internet muri sisitemu ya <Izina rya ISP> bisaba kwandika login hamwe n'ijambo ry'ibanga. Ijambo ry'ibanga na login bigomba kurindwa n'umukoresha kugira ngo bitagurwa n'abandi.
cp_portal_cookies_note: Sisitemu yo kwinjira ikoresha cookies kugira ngo ibike amakuru muri mudasobwa yawe. Cookies zikoreshwa kugira ngo dutange serivisi ku rwego rwo hejuru kandi zihuze n'ibikenewe by'umukoresha. Gukoresha uru rubuga utahinduye imigabo ya cookies bisigura ko zizobikwa mu gikoresho cawe.
cp_session_timeout_content:
Igihe wamaze guhabwa co gukoresha Internet kirangiye, niko guhuza guhagaritswe.
Ivyo ushobora gukora
  • Kugira ngo ukomeze gukoresha Internet, urakeneye kureba niba bishoboka kwongereza igihe co gukoresha cyangwa kugura igihe ciyongera.
  • Nimba ufise ibibazo, urashobora kuvugana n abashinzwe ubuhinga.
cp_error_login_err: Login canke ijambo ry'ibanga si vyemewe
cp_error_info:
• Hakoreshwe login canke ijambo ry'ibanga ritari ryo
  • Caps Lock iri ku kibaho c'inyuguti yawe irafashwe
  • Hari ikindi gikoresho cinjiye ku konti yawe
  • Konti yawe yifunze na sisitemu kubera ikibazo c'igikoresho cawe
  • Konti yarangije igihe co gukoresha canke yakuweho kubera kutishura amafaranga y'aboneza
cp_error_solution_title: Gerageza gukemura ikibazo ukurikije izi nama
cp_error_solution:
• Reba neza ko winjiza login n'ijambo ry'ibanga neza (ukurikije inyuguti nini n'utoya)
  • Reba niba konti yawe yarishuwe
  • Nimba ikibazo kitajanye n'izi nama, vugana n'abashinzwe urusobe
cp_rules_content:
1. Amategeko yanditswe muri html isanzwe

  • Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Proin nibh augue, suscipit a, scelerisque sed, lacinia in, mi. Cras vel lorem. Etiam pellentesque aliquet tellus. cp_login_attempt_content: Sisitemu yemera kwikosora %s-uburyo bwo kwinjira nabi. Iyo umubare w'ukwikosora urenze, kwinjira kuzohagarikwa mu gihe ca %s %s.
a11y-keys_data-content:
Kuvanga ibikanda
⇧ Shift (ibumoso)
+ ⌥ Alt (ibumoso)
+ inyuguti

⇧ Shift + ⌥ Alt + U
fokus ku kibanza Izina ry'umukoresha

⇧ Shift + ⌥ Alt + P
fokus ku kibanza Ijambo ry'ibanga

⇧ Shift + ⌥ Alt + A
hitamwo/canzura akabuto "Nemeye amategeko"

⇧ Shift + ⌥ Alt + R
ifungura akadirisha k'Amategeko

⇧ Shift + ⌥ Alt + I
injiye umukoresha

⇧ Shift + ⌥ Alt + O
asohora umukoresha

⇧ Shift + ⌥ Alt + L
tangura guhindura ururimi
a11y-lang-keys_data-content:
Kanda hamwe ⇧ Shift (ibumoso) hanyuma ukande inyuguti z'ikode y'ururimi (ISO 639-1) rimwe canke rimwe inyuma y'irindi.

Urugero:
⇧ Shift + P + L → guhindura ururimi ku Kirundi (pl)

⇧ Shift + E + N → guhindura ururimi ku Icyongereza (en)

⇧ Shift + D + E → guhindura ururimi ku Kidage (de)

⇧ Shift + F + R → guhindura ururimi ku Gifaransa (fr)

⇧ Shift + E + S → guhindura ururimi ku Ispanyoli (es)

⇧ Shift + I + T → guhindura ururimi ku Kiitaliyani (it)
...
polyglotLanguageSwitcher_data-content: Aha urashobora guhindura ururimi rwa porogaramu. Kanda ku kibaho %s kugira ufungure akabuto %s canke Shift hamwe n'inyuguti z'ikode y'ururimi rimwe canke inyuma y'irindi, urugero: Shift + P + L bizohindura ururimi.
fieldUsername_data-content: Iki kibanza kirimwo urufunguzo rwo kwinjira. Kanda hamwe %s kugira ushire fokus ku kibanza %s.
fieldPassword_data-content: Iki kibanza kirimwo urufunguzo rwo kwinjira. Kanda hamwe %s kugira ushire fokus ku kibanza %s.
login-rules_data-content: Aha uzoshira umukono ku mategeko agenga gukoresha Internet nk’uko abisobanura mu mategeko.
cp_portal_event_undefined_data-content: Aha urabonera amakuru ku bijanye n'ukuntu igikoresho cawe gihuje n'urubuga.
signin_data-content: Kanda ku buto Kwinjira kugira utangure gukoresha Internet.
signin_anon_data-content: Kanda ku buto Kwinjira kugira utangure gukoresha Internet.
logoff_data-content: Kanda ku buto Gusohoka kugira urangize guhuza n'Internet.
